title: Very slow download speeds for just Riot content.

replies.body: I can't download the installer...it times out before it finishes...both in chrome and the Hextech tool.

Since you've now done a complete uninstall, you're going to need to wait for that download to finish, unfortunately. If you try transferring the files from a different pc, you will most likely still need to patch and you also run the risk of damaged some of the files in the transfer. I'd suggest letting that download finish overnight if you can, and you could also check up on some of your [**network settings**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) to make sure everything is configured best for League.
